mean_cn: v. 使穿衣，给…穿衣，打扮；  n. 女服，童装，服装
mean_en: a piece of clothing for a woman or a girl that has a top part that covers the upper body and a skirt that hangs down to cover the legs
sentence: This dress is lovely, but the only place I can wear it is a fashion show.
sentence_trans: 这条裙子真好看，但我能穿去的唯一场所就是时装秀。
